name: Blog
description: Articles that don't require their own series and can be discussed in just a single article.

01_how-to-get-started-with-computational.heading: How to get started with Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
01_how-to-get-started-with-computational.description: The best way to learn CFD from scratch requires a good collection of resources. This is a complete guide for the best books, online resources and CFD software.

02_should-you-specialise-in-cfd-and-get-.heading: Should you specialise in CFD and get a university degree?
02_should-you-specialise-in-cfd-and-get-.description: CFD is an fascinating area of study. Discover if it is worth specialising in this field and which universities offer specialised MSc degrees in CFD.

03_setting-up-a-programming-environment-.heading: Setting up a programming environment to develop CFD codes
03_setting-up-a-programming-environment-.description: In this article, you'll learn how to create a programming environment to develop and run CFD codes on Windows, Linux, and macOS.

04_why-is-everyone-switching-to-gpu-comp.heading: Why is everyone switching to GPU computing in CFD?
04_why-is-everyone-switching-to-gpu-comp.description: Discover why every general-purpose CFD solver is switching to GPUs by learning the key differences between GPUs and CPUs that make them so powerful!

05_can-chatgpt-write-fully-functional-cf.heading: Can ChatGPT write fully functional CFD solvers?
05_can-chatgpt-write-fully-functional-cf.description: Explore whether ChatGPT is capable of producing production-grade CFD solvers or if it fails miserably, as well as how to best use generative AI tools for coding

06_the-6-biggest-and-unsolved-challenges.heading: The 6 biggest and unsolved challenges in CFD
06_the-6-biggest-and-unsolved-challenges.description: Learn about the 6 biggest challenges in CFD we need to overcome to achieve NASA's postulated 4 grand challenges in their 2030 CFD vision report

07_learn-openfoam-the-good-the-bad-and-t.heading: Learn OpenFOAM: The Good, The Bad, And The Evil!
07_learn-openfoam-the-good-the-bad-and-t.description: OpenFOAM is polarising; either you love it or you hate it. In this article, I review the good and the bad you can expect when you decide to learn OpenFOAM.

08_how-to-manage-uncertainty-in-cfd-the-.heading: How to manage uncertainty in CFD: the grid convergence index
08_how-to-manage-uncertainty-in-cfd-the-.description: Learn about common errors and uncertainties in CFD simulations and how to use the grid convergence index to quantify the largest uncertainty in your simulation.

09_how-to-determine-the-best-stopping-cr.heading: How to determine the best stopping criterion for CFD simulations
09_how-to-determine-the-best-stopping-cr.description: Learn how convergence in CFD is judged, what common pitfalls exist, and how we can avoid those with the help of a new convergence judging framework.

10_ive-tried-su2-for-a-week---should-you.heading: I've tried SU2 for a week - should you, too?
10_ive-tried-su2-for-a-week---should-you.description: I spent a week with the open-source CFD solver SU2, and this article reflects on my first impression of it. Is it any good? Let's find out together!

11_what-is-numerical-dissipation-in-cfd-.heading: What is numerical dissipation in CFD and why do we need it?
11_what-is-numerical-dissipation-in-cfd-.description: This article clarifies the role of numerical dissipation once and for all by reviewing its origin, mitigation strategies, and applications.
